GSP31kavsttvu:5: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP31kavsttvu:7: ṛjumārgeṇa siddhyato 'rthasya vakreṇa sādhanāyogāt iti kecit /
GSP31kavsttvu:8_1: darśayiṣyāmaḥ / duḥkhatrayaṃ ca ādhyātmikamādhibhautikamādhidaivikaṃ ca / tatrādhyātmikaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:8_2: dvidhā śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca vātapittaśleṣmaṇāṃ vaiṣamyanimittaṃ śārīram kāmakrodhalobhamoherṣyāviṣādaviṣayaviśeṣādarśanakāraṇakaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:8_4: duḥkhaṃ dvividham / ādhibhautikamādhidaivaikaṃ ca / tatrādhibhautikaṃ mānuṣapakṣisarīsṛpasthāvaranibandhanam /
GSP31kavsttvu:8_6: duḥkhaṃ rajaḥpariṇāmaviśeṣo nityapariṇāmitvādidamapi nityamiti na śakyate bādhitum
GSP31kavsttvu:8_7: tathāpi śakya eva tadabhibhavaḥ kartuṃ sādhanena tacca sādhanaṃ śāstrajanitaṃ prakṛtipuruṣānyatājñānaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:46_0: svakāraṇatve tu tasyāpekṣayā kāraṇatvāt svasyaiva pūrvavartitvaṃ kāryatvāt paścādvartitvamityasaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:46_2: sā ca prakarotīti prakṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ sāmyāvasthā /
GSP31kavsttvu:47_0: kaścidarthaḥ prakṛtirvikṛtiśca tacca mahattattvamahaṅkāraḥ pañcatanmātrāṇi ceti saptasaṅkhyāko
GSP31kavsttvu:47_1: gaṇaḥ kasyacitprakṛtiḥ kasyacidvikṛtiḥ / tadyathā mahattattvamahaṅkārasya prakṛtirvikṛtiśca
GSP31kavsttvu:47_2: mūlaprakṛteḥ tathā ahaṅkāraḥ pañcatanmātrāṇāmindriyāṇāṃ ca prakṛtirvikṛtirmahataḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:47_3: tathā pañcatanmātrāṇi bhūtānāmākāśādīnāṃ prakṛtayo vikṛtayaścāhaṅkārasya / pañca
GSP31kavsttvu:47_4: mahābhūtānyekādaśendriyāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṅkhyāko gaṇo vikṛtireva na tu kasyacitprakṛtiḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:47_5: nanu pṛthivyādīnāmapi goghaṭavṛkṣādayo vikārā upalabhyante tathā tadvikāraviśeṣāṇāṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:47_6: payobījādīnāṃ dadhyaṅkurādaya iti kathaṃ vikṛtitvameva teṣāmiti cenna tattvāntaropādānatvaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:47_7: prakṛtitvamihābhyupagatam na tveteṣāṃ tadasti sthaulyendriyagrāhyatayā goghaṭādīnāṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:47_8: samānatvāt na tattvāntaratā pṛthivyādibhyaḥ / uktaṃ ca tattvakaumudyām “sarveṣāṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:47_9: goghaṭādīnāṃ sthūlatendriyagrāhyatā ca sameti” na tattvāntaram / puruṣastu na kasyacit
GSP31kavsttvu:49_1: nanu yatra yatra pratyakṣamapravartamānaṃ tattadatyantā 'saditi vyāptiḥ suprasiddhā
GSP31kavsttvu:49_3: yuktaṃ gaganakusumādīnāmiveti cenna nahi yat pratyakṣāgocaraṃ tadatyantāsaditi vyāptigraho
GSP31kavsttvu:49_5: rudato maraṇaṃ syāt na tvevamasti / kiñca kiṃ sarvapratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ sattve hetuḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:50_0: nādyaḥ nahi gṛhāntaradeśāntarakālāntaragataṃ vastu kenāpyayoginā pratyakṣeṇa viṣayīkartuṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:50_1: śakyamanyathā sarva eva sarvajñaḥ syāt parabuddherapratyakṣatayā sarvaiḥ sarvaṃ pratyakṣeṇa
GSP31kavsttvu:50_2: gṛhyate navetyasarvajñena niścetumaśakyatayā saṃśayānivṛtteḥ / nāpi caramaḥ vyabhicārāt
GSP31kavsttvu:50_3: nahi nagarasthena svenānupalabdho gavaya etāvataivāraṇyakopalabdhasya tasyāpalāpasambhavaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:50_4: uktañca līlāvatīkāreṇa “sarvādṛṣṭeśca sandehāt svādṛṣṭervyabhicārata” iti / tasmāt
GSP31kavsttvu:50_5: pratyakṣapravṛttipratikūlābhāvaviśiṣṭaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yatra na pravartate tadatyantāsaditi
GSP31kavsttvu:50_6: niścetuṃ śakyam na tu pratyakṣāpravṛttimātrāt anyathā puruṣapradhānamahatsvargāpūrvadevatādīnāmatīndriyāṇāmatyantābhāvaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:50_7: syāt / tena viyati gacchataḥ patatriṇo grahaṇe 'tidūratvameva pratikūlam tathā netragatakajjalagrahaṇe
GSP31kavsttvu:50_8: 'tisāmīpyam evaṃ rūpaśabdādigrahaṇe āndhyabadhiratvādayaḥ tathā viṣayagrahaṇe manasaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:50_10: na paśyati / paramāṇvādiviṣayatāyāṃ saukṣmyameva pratikūlam yataḥ praṇihitamanā api
GSP31kavsttvu:50_11: taṃ na paśyati / bhittyādiparavastugrahaṇe tadvyavadhānameva pratikūlaṃ sampratipannapadārthagrahaṇe
GSP31kavsttvu:50_12: hastādivyavadhānavat / kvacidabhibhavaḥ yathā ahani saurībhirbhābhirabhibhūtaṃ nakṣatrasūryādigrahe
GSP31kavsttvu:50_13: cakṣuḥ samarthaṃ na bhavati / kvacit samānābhihāraḥ pratikūlaṃ yathā jalāśaye 'mbudavimuktajalabindugrahaṇe
GSP31kavsttvu:50_16: pratibandhakaṃ kalpyate na tu tadabhāvādevāpravṛttiḥ / uktañca sāṅkhyamūlakāreṇa
GSP31kavsttvu:50_18: na tvasya tadastītyabhāva eva yukta iti cenna kāryaṃ hi kāraṇānumāpakaṃ bhavatīti
GSP31kavsttvu:50_19: sarvavādyabhimatam tathā ca mahadādikāryānyathānupapattyaiva pradhānasiddhiriti na
GSP31kavsttvu:50_20: tadabhāvo yuktaḥ / nanu kāryānyathānupapattyā kāraṇasiddhau tantrāntarābhimatakāraṇasiddhiḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:50_21: setsyati na tu tvadabhimatapradhānasiddhiriti cenna mataparyālocanena yanmataṃ kapilasūtranibaddhaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:50_22: pradhānasādhanānuguṇaṃ tadeva yuktisahamanyat tu bāhyamatavat matābhāsatvādbādhyameva /
GSP31kavsttvu:52_1: asadalīkaṃ kāraṇaṃ sattvādirūpaśabdādyātmakaṃ kathaṃ syāt sadasatostādātmyadarśanāt
GSP31kavsttvu:52_2: kāryaṃ hi kāraṇasamavetaṃ tantupaṭādisthaleṣu prasiddham tathā ca ghaṭo 'san paṭo
GSP31kavsttvu:52_3: 'sannityasatsamavetaṃ sarvo vyavahartā vyavahareta na tu sadidamiti sattāvaiśiṣṭyena pratītiḥ syāt /
GSP31kavsttvu:53_0: atha sadvivarto 'yaṃ prapañca iti yadvedāntimatam / tadapyasādhu anenāpi sataḥ sajjāyata
GSP31kavsttvu:53_1: iti matasiddhirna syāt / advayasya sadvayatayā bhāne rajjoḥ srakkhaṇḍasarppādyātmanā
GSP31kavsttvu:53_2: bhānavat bhrāntireva syāt bādhitaviṣayatayā rajjusarpapratyayavat prapañcajñānasyāpramāṇatayā
GSP31kavsttvu:53_4: vyavahāramātrocchedaḥ syāt laukikavaidikavyavahārānuṣṭhāne ca kasyacit pravṛttyanupapattyā
GSP31kavsttvu:53_5: bhogāpavargau na syātāmiti tacchāstrāprāmāṇyaṃ syāt / apasiddhāntaśca na hi vedāntimate
GSP31kavsttvu:54: bālān prati vivarto 'yaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sakalaṃ jagat /
GSP31kavsttvu:56_0: sato 'sajjāyata iti sataḥ paramāṇorasaddvyaṇukākhyaṃ kāryaṃ jāyata iti kaṇabhakṣākṣacaraṇamatamapi
GSP31kavsttvu:56_1: na yuktisaham tathā hi paramāṇurhi dvyaṇukasamavāyikāraṇam dvyaṇukaṃ cāsadityasattvāviśeṣācchaśaśṛṅgādisamavāyikāraṇatāpi pa
GSP31kavsttvu:169_0: sarveṣāmasatāṃ sattvaṃ syāt sadasadvibhāgo jagati dattajalāñjaliḥ syāditi na tārkikavaiśeṣikamataṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:169_1: vicārasaham / tasmāt sataḥ sajjāyata iti sāṅkhyamatameva yuktisaham / sataḥ kāraṇāt
GSP31kavsttvu:169_2: svotpatteḥ prāgapi sadeva kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpārādabhivyaktimāpnoti / na ca siddhasādhanatā
GSP31kavsttvu:169_3: kāraṇavaiyarthyaṃ ceti vācyam kāryasattve 'pi tadabhivyaktau kāraṇaṃ prayojanavaditi
GSP31kavsttvu:169_4: na kiñcidavadyam / asatkāryapakṣe tu kāraṇavaiyarthyaṃ sphuṭameva na hyasataḥ kāraṇasambandho
GSP31kavsttvu:169_5: nirūpayituṃ śakyate sambaddhameva asambaddhena janyate asambaddhasya janyatve sarvasmāt
GSP31kavsttvu:169_6: sarvaṃ syāt kāraṇaniyamo 'stamiyāt / asaccetkāryaṃ na kāraṇavyāpārāt sadbhavitumarhati
GSP31kavsttvu:169_7: uktañca tattvakaumudyām - nahi nīlaṃ śilpasahasreṇāpi pītaṃ kartuṃ śakyam / na ca
GSP31kavsttvu:169_8: kāraṇavyāpārāt pūrvaṃ ghaṭo 'san saṃśca vyāpārānantaramiti ghaṭasya sattvāsattve
GSP31kavsttvu:169_9: dharmāviti vācyam dharmasya bhāvadharmatvena tenaiva dharmiṇaḥ sattvaṃ svasthityanyathānupapattyā
GSP31kavsttvu:169_10: sādhitamiti sadeva kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpārādūrdhvamiva prāgapi / kāraṇavyāpārastu tadabhivyaktāvananyathāsiddhaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:169_11: anyatrāpi kāraṇavyāpārādabhivyaktireva dṛśyate yathā 'vaghātena dhānyeṣu taṇḍulānām
GSP31kavsttvu:169_12: avapīḍanena tileṣu tailasya dohanena saurabheyīṇāṃ payasa iti / asadutpattau tu na
GSP31kavsttvu:169_13: dṛṣṭānto 'sti tasmāt sadeva kāryaṃ kāraṇavyāpāreṇābhivyajyate / asatā kāraṇasambandhāsambhavāt
GSP31kavsttvu:172_0: kiñca sambaddhamapi tadeva karoti yatra yat kāraṇaṃ śaktam śaktiśca kāryaikādhigamyā
GSP31kavsttvu:172_1: yathā cakṣuṣaiva rūpajñānaṃ bhavati nendriyāntareṇetīdameva tatra śaktamityadhigamyate /
GSP31kavsttvu:172_2: tathā ca sā śaktiḥ śaktakāraṇāśrayā śakyakāryāśrayā sarvatra vā syāt ?
GSP31kavsttvu:173_0: antye sarvasmāt sarvaṃ syāt / atha kārye sā śaktistadā kathamasataḥ kāryasya śaktyāśrayatā
GSP31kavsttvu:173_1: tathā ca śaktena śakyamutpādyate śakyaṃ ca kāraṇātmakam kāraṇaṃ ca saditi kathaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:174_1: yathāśvavṛkṣayoḥ / ito 'pi nārthāntaratvaṃ tantupaṭayoḥ saṃyogāprāptyadarśanāt arthāntaratve
GSP31kavsttvu:174_2: saṃyogo dṛṣṭo rajjughaṭakuṇḍabadarādau aprāptirapi dṛṣṭā sumeruvidhyayoriva iha ca
GSP31kavsttvu:174_4: pramāṇaṃ coktaṃ sāṅkhyācāryaiḥ tadyathā na paṭastantubhyo bhidyate taddharmatvāt
GSP31kavsttvu:174_5: iha yadyato bhidyate tat tasya dharmo na bhavati yathā gauraśvasya dharmaśca paṭastantūnāntasmānnārthāntaram /
GSP31kavsttvu:174_6: gurutvāntarāgrahaṇādapi na kāraṇādarthāntaraṃ kāryam / evamabhede siddhe tantava
GSP31kavsttvu:174_7: eva tena tena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa pariṇatāḥ paṭo na tu paṭastantubhyo 'rthāntaram /
GSP31kavsttvu:174_10: tadanyathānupapattyā bhedasiddhiḥ / tatra ekasyāpi kūrmasyāvayavā niḥsarantyāvirbhavanti
GSP31kavsttvu:174_11: ta eva kūrmaśarīre niviśamānāstirobhavanti nahi te kūrmāvayavā utpadyante dhvaṃsante
GSP31kavsttvu:174_12: vā evamekasyāpi suvarṇasya mṛdo va kaṭakakuṇḍalādayo ghaṭādayo niḥsaranta utpannā
GSP31kavsttvu:174_13: iti vyavahāraṃ bhajante ta eva niviśamānāstirobhavanti naśyantītyucyante na punaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:174_14: sadasatornirodhotpādayornidarśanamasti / uktaṃ ca bhagavatā nāsato vidyate bhāvo
GSP31kavsttvu:174_15: nābhāvo vidyate sata iti / yathā saṅkocavikāśavadbhyaḥ svāvayavebhyaḥ kūrmo na bhidyate
GSP31kavsttvu:174_16: tathā mṛtsuvarṇādibhyo 'pi kaṭakakuṇḍalādayo na bhinnāḥ / na ca nāma buddhyarthakriyābhedāt
GSP31kavsttvu:174_17: kāryakāraṇayorbhedasiddhiriti vācyam naṭe vyabhicārāt / naṭo hi daśaratho 'haṃ rāmo
GSP31kavsttvu:174_19: kurute tathā ca satyapi bhedatraye naṭabhedādarśanāt yathāhuḥ -
GSP31kavsttvu:179_0: ekasyāpi vahnerdāhakatvapācakatvabhedena nānārthakriyākāritvaṃ dṛśyate na hyetāvatā
GSP31kavsttvu:179_2: militvāvasthāviśeṣamavāpya yathā tānyeva tannivṛttau sāmarthyamadhigacchanti tathaika
GSP31kavsttvu:179_3: eva tantuḥ prāvaraṇādyarthakriyāsamartho 'pi militāsta evāvasthāviśeṣaṃ prāpyāvirbhūtapaṭabhāvāḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:179_4: prāvaraṇādyarthakriyāṃ kariṣyanti tasmātsadeva kāryaṃ kāraṇāt tadabhivyaktiriti /
GSP31kavsttvu:180: ādye kāraṇavyāpārāsambavaḥ nahi sadutpattau kenāpi kāraṇāni vyāpāryante / antye prāptamasadutpādanatvamiti cenna tavāpi keyamutpattiḥ satyasatī vā ?
GSP31kavsttvu:181_0: ādye na kāraṇaprayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ / antye 'sadutpattirutpadyata iti tadutpatterapyutpattyantaraṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:181_1: tatrāpyanyaditi sphuṭaivānavasthā / atha paṭāt tadutpattirnātiricyate tadā paṭa ityukte
GSP31kavsttvu:181_2: punarutpadyate iti na vācyaṃ paunaruktyāt tathotpadyate ityuktvā punaḥ paṭa iti na
GSP31kavsttvu:181_3: vācyaṃ pūrvoktadoṣādeva paṭo vinaśyatītyapi na vācyaṃ virodhāt tasmātsvasattāsamavāyo
GSP31kavsttvu:181_4: vā svakāraṇasamavāyo vā paṭotpattiḥ samavāyasya ca nityatvena sarvathāpi na paṭotpattiḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:181_5: sambhavati na tadarthañca kāraṇāni vyāpāryyante tathā ca sata eva paṭāderāvirbhāve
GSP31kavsttvu:181_6: kāraṇāpekṣeti na kiñcidavadyam / na ca paṭādikāryarūpeṇa kāraṇasambandhastasyākriyatvāt
GSP31kavsttvu:182_1: pratipādanīyam / tacca vyaktaṃ pṛthivyādi taccāvyaktātpradhānādvilakṣaṇam yata idaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:182_2: sakāraṇakaṃ tata evānityaṃ parābhimatavināśasāmagryā tirobhavati / avyāpakaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:182_3: hi kāryaṃ vyāpnoti na tu kāryaṃ kāraṇam / sakriyaṃ ca buddhyādayaḥ pūrvapūrvopāttaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:182_4: dehaṃ parityajanti dehāntaraṃ copādadate saiva teṣāṃ kriyā pṛthivyādīnāṃ kriyā pariṇāmarūpeṇa
GSP31kavsttvu:182_5: prasiddhaiva / pratipuruṣaṃ buddhyādibhedādanekam tathā ghaṭaśarīrādibhedena pṛthivyādyapyanekam /
GSP31kavsttvu:182_8: na saṃyogastādātmyāt nāpi sattvarajastamasāṃ saṃyogaḥ aprāptipūrvikā prāptiḥ saṃyogasta
GSP31kavsttvu:218_0: kārye janayitavye tadapekṣāṃ kurute tathā ca svakārye janayitavye paratantraṃ vyaktam /
GSP31kavsttvu:218_1: yata ityabhivyāpya yaduktaṃ tadviparītamavyaktam yadyapyavyaktasya pariṇāmalakṣaṇākriyāsti
GSP31kavsttvu:219_0: idānīṃ vyaktāvyaktayoḥ sādharmyaṃ puruṣācca vaidharmyaṃ pratipādanīyam / vyaktaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:219_1: hi triguṇaṃ trayo guṇāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakā asyeti / atra kāryakāraṇayorabhedāt
GSP31kavsttvu:219_3: veditavyam / tathā aviveki yathā pradhānaṃ sato na vivicyate tathā mahadādayo 'pi
GSP31kavsttvu:219_4: pradhānānna vivicyante tatsvarūpatvāt / yadvā saṃbhūyakāritā 'vivekaḥ nahyekaṃ kiñcitkāryaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:219_5: janayituṃ kṣamaṃ bhavatyapi tu saṃbhūya sarvaḥ sarvaṃ karoti / evamacetanaṃ pradhānabuddhyādayaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:219_6: sarve acetanā tathā prasavarūpadharmavantaḥ / ete vyaktadharmāḥ kathitāsta evāvyaktasyāpītyavagantavyamidameva
GSP31kavsttvu:220_1: viparītaḥ puruṣa iti puruṣasya vyaktāvyaktavaidharmyam / nanvahetumattvanityatvādi
GSP31kavsttvu:220_2: pradhānasādharmyaṃ puruṣasya pratīyate tathā cānekatvaṃ vyaktasādharmyamevaṃ sati
GSP31kavsttvu:220_3: kathaṃ vyaktāvyaktaviparītaḥ puruṣa iti cenna ahetumattvādisādharmye 'pyatraiguṇyādyasyāstyeva
GSP31kavsttvu:220_4: vaidharmyamiti na doṣaḥ / na ca traiguṇyamaprasiddham prītyaprītiviṣādātmakā guṇā
GSP31kavsttvu:220_5: iti sāṃkhyācāryāḥ / atra krameṇa prītiḥ sukhaṃ tadeva sattvam tathā aprītirduḥkhamaprītyātmako
GSP31kavsttvu:220_6: rajo guṇaḥ evaṃ viṣādo moho viṣādātmakastamoguṇaḥ / yanmate prītirduḥkhābhāvaḥ tathā
GSP31kavsttvu:220_9: prayojanamapyavagantavyam / kriyātmakena rajasa laghu sattvaṃ sarvatra nītaṃ syādativāyunā
GSP31kavsttvu:220_10: tūlāvayavavadyadi guruṇā tamasā niyamanaṃ na syāttamoniyataṃ tu kvacideva pravartayati
GSP31kavsttvu:220_12: tadyathā sattvaṃ rajastamasī abhibhūyātmanaḥ śāntāṃ vṛttimadhigacchati tathā rajaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:220_13: sattvatamasī abhibhūya ghorāṃ vṛttimeti evaṃ tamaḥ sattvarajasī abhibhūya mūḍhāmiti /
GSP31kavsttvu:220_15: prakāśenopakaroti rajaḥ prakāśaniyamāvāśritya pravṛtyetarayoḥ tamaḥ prakāśapravṛttī
GSP31kavsttvu:220_16: āśritya niyamenetarayoriti / tathā anyonyajananavṛttayaḥ / anyatamo 'nyatamaṃ janayati
GSP31kavsttvu:220_17: jananamatra parimāṇaḥ sa ca guṇānāṃ sadṛśarūpaḥ / ata eva na hetumattvaṃ tattvāntarasya
GSP31kavsttvu:220_18: hetorabhāvāt / nāpyanityatvaṃ tattvāntare layābhāvāt / anyonyasaṃjñāvyabhicāriṇaśca / uktañca
GSP31kavsttvu:222: rajaso mithunaṃ sattvaṃ sattvasya mithunaṃ rajaḥ //
GSP31kavsttvu:227_0: niyatakṛtyaṃ tu teṣāmidaṃ laghutvaṃ prakāśakatvaṃ ca sattvasyaiva na tu tayoḥ kasyacit
GSP31kavsttvu:227_2: gatirbhavati tadeva kasyacittiryaggamane heturyathā vāyoḥ / evaṃ karaṇānāṃ vṛttikuśalatāheturlāghavaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:227_3: gurutve tu tāni mandāni syuriti sattvasya prakāśātmakatvamuktam / sattvatamasī akriyatayā
GSP31kavsttvu:227_4: svakāryotpādane 'vasīdantī rajasopaṣṭebhyete / avasādādvimucyotsāhe prayatnavatī kriyete / uktaṃ ca
GSP31kavsttvu:228: sattvaṃ laghu prakāśakamiṣṭamupaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca rajaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:229_0: kuta upaṣṭambhakaṃ yataścalamiti / rajaścalatayā sarvatastraiguṇyaṃ cālayedyadi guruṇā
GSP31kavsttvu:229_1: āvṛṇvatā tamasā tatra pratibandho na syāt tamasā tu tatastato vyāvṛttya kvacideva
GSP31kavsttvu:229_2: pravartyate iti niyāmakaṃ tamaḥ / yathāhuḥ guru varaṇakameva tama iti / tathāca laghu
GSP31kavsttvu:229_3: prakāśakaṃ sattvameva upaṣṭambhakaṃ calaṃ ca raja eva guru varaṇakaṃ tama eva / nanu
GSP31kavsttvu:229_4: parasparaṃ virodhaśīlānāṃ guṇānāṃ sundopasundanyāyena parasparaṃ bādha eva yukto
GSP31kavsttvu:229_5: na tvekakāryakartṛtvamiti cet na evaṃbhūtānāmapyekakāryakartṛtāyāḥ pradarśanāt /
GSP31kavsttvu:229_6: tadyathā varttitaile analavirodhinī athānalena militvā rūpaprakāśalakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:229_7: kurutaḥ yathāca vātapittaśleṣmāṇaḥ parasparaṃ virodhaśīlā api militāḥ santaḥ śarīradhāraṇakāryyakāriṇaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:229_8: tathā sattvarajastamāṃsi viruddhaśīlānyapi saha vartsyanti militvā caikaṃ kāryyaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:229_9: kariṣyanti ca puruṣārthavaśāt / uktañca pradīpavaccārthato vṛttiriti / guṇānāṃ pradhānātmakatvādaikye
GSP31kavsttvu:229_11: svāminaṃ sukhākaroti tat kasya hetostaṃ prati tasyāḥ sukharūpasamudbhavāt saiva sapatnīrduḥkhākaroti
GSP31kavsttvu:229_12: tatkasya hetostāṃ prati tasyāḥ duḥkharūpasamudbhavāt evaṃ puruṣāntaraṃ tāmavindamānaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:229_13: saiva mohayati tatkasya hetostaṃ prati tasyāḥ moharūpasamudbhavāt / anayā striyā
GSP31kavsttvu:229_14: sarve bhāvā vyākhyātāḥ / tatra yatsukhakāraṇaṃ tatsukhātmakaṃ sattvam evaṃ yat duḥkhakāraṇaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:229_15: tat duḥkhātmakaṃ rajaḥ tathā yanmohahetustanmohātmakaṃ tamaḥ / tasmātkāraṇavyāpārātsadeva
GSP31kavsttvu:229_16: kāryaṃ pūrvam / tadeva punastadvyāpārādāvirbhavati yathā santyeva kūrmāṅgāni niḥsaranti
GSP31kavsttvu:229_17: vibhajyante idaṃ kūrmaśarīrametāni tadaṅgāni tena tāni saṅkocitāni tasminnavyaktībhavanti
GSP31kavsttvu:229_18: tathā mṛtsuvarṇādibhyaḥ santyeva ghaṭakuṇḍalādīnyāvirbhavanti vibhajyante iyaṃ mṛdayaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:229_19: tatkāryo ghaṭa ityādi / tathā santyeva pṛthivyādīni kāraṇāttanmātrādāvirbhavanti
GSP31kavsttvu:229_20: vibhajyante idamasya kāraṇamidamasya kāryamiti tathā santyeva tanmātrāṇyahaṅkārādāvirbhavanti
GSP31kavsttvu:229_21: vibhajyante evaṃ sannevāhaṅkāro mahato 'bhivyaktimeti sanneva ca mahānmūlaprakṛterabhivyaktiṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:229_23: prapañcasya vibhāgaḥ / sargamātraṃ mṛtpiṇḍaṃ hemapiṇḍaṃ vā viśanto ghaṭakuṇḍalādayo
GSP31kavsttvu:229_25: viśantaḥ svasvarūpeṇa tanmātrāṇyabhivyaktayanti svasvarūpeṇa kāraṇamabhivyaktamapi kāryasvarūpa
GSP31kavsttvu:230_0: ṃ svakīyaṃ svasminnanabhivyaktayati tanmātrāṇi tathāhaṅkāraṃ viśantyahaṅkāraṃ svāpekṣayā
GSP31kavsttvu:230_1: 'vyaktayanti tathāhaṅkāro mahāntaṃ viśan mahāntamavyaktayati mahānpradhānaṃ svakāraṇaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:230_2: viśan tadavyaktayati pradhānasya tu na kvacitpraveśo 'kāraṇatvādapi tu tatsarvakāryāṇāmavyaktam
GSP31kavsttvu:231_0: kecana avyaktaṃ vā mahāntaṃ vāhaṅkāraṃ vā indriyāṇi vā bhūtāni vā ātmatvenādāya tānevopāsate
GSP31kavsttvu:231_1: te tu vakṣyamāṇarītyā 'pākaraṇīyāḥ / avyaktādervyatiriktaḥ puruṣo 'sti avyaktamahadahaṅkārādayaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:231_2: parārthāḥ kutaḥ saṅghātatvāt yaḥ saṅghāto bhavati sa parārtho dṛṣṭastailatāmbūlaghṛtadadhidugdhānnavastrādivat
GSP31kavsttvu:231_3: sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvena sarve saṅghātāstathāca yadarthaṃ saṅghātāḥ sa eva puruṣaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:231_4: nanu śayanāsanādiḥ saṅghātaḥ saṅghātaśarīrādiparārtho dṛṣṭo na tvātmānaṃ prati parārthaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:231_5: tasmātsaṅghātāntarameva sādhayeyurnāsaṃhatamātmānamiti yaduktam tanna sādhu saṅghātasya
GSP31kavsttvu:231_7: tasyāpi tathātvamityanavasthā dustarā syāt / kiñca saṅghātasya pārārthyamātreṇa vyāptirna
GSP31kavsttvu:231_8: tu saṅghātapārārthyena / na ca dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭatvāttathā kalpyata iti vācyam / dṛṣṭāntadṛṣṭayāvaddharmāṇāṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:231_10: syāt / yathāhuḥ triguṇatvādayo hi dharmā saṅghātatvena vyāptāḥ te tu asminpare vyāvartamānāstraiguṇyādi
GSP31kavsttvu:231_11: vyāvartayanti brāhmaṇyamiva nivartamānaṃ kaṭhatvādikam / adhiṣṭhānādapi puruṣāstitvaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:231_13: tathā sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ buddhyādi pareṇādhiṣṭhātavyam / bhoktṛbhāvādapi puruṣāstitvamavaseyam
GSP31kavsttvu:231_14: bhogye hi sukhaduḥkhe anukūlapratikūlavedanīye pratyātmamanubhūyete tenānayoranukūlatayā
GSP31kavsttvu:231_15: pratikūlatayā vā 'nubhavitrā kenacidbhavitavyam / na ca buddhyādireva tatheti vācyam /
GSP31kavsttvu:231_16: teṣāṃ sukhādyātmakatvena svenaiva svavedane ātmāśrayaḥ syāt / kaivalyārthaṃ pravṛtterapi
GSP31kavsttvu:231_17: puruṣāstitvaṃ siddham duḥkhatrayātyantikanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ kaivalyaṃ na tāvadbuddhyādīnāṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:231_18: te hi sukhaduḥkhamohātmakāḥ kathaṃ svabhāvādviyojayituṃ śakyāḥ tasmātkaivalyārthamāgamānāṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:231_19: mahādhiyāṃ ca pravṛtterasti buddhyādvyatirikta ātmeti puruṣāstitvaṃ siddham / nanu
GSP31kavsttvu:231_20: bhavatvevaṃ buddhyādyatiriktātmasiddhistathāpi sa kiṃ pratiśarīraṃ bhinna eka eva
GSP31kavsttvu:231_21: veti cedbhinna eveti brūmaḥ janmamaraṇādivyavasthānyathānupapattyā bahutvasyaiva
GSP31kavsttvu:234_1: janma na tu puruṣasya pariṇāmastasyāpariṇāmitvāt teṣāmeva ca dehādīnāmupāttānāṃ parityāgo
GSP31kavsttvu:234_2: maraṇaṃ na tvātmano vināśastasya kūṭasthasya nityatvāt / buddhyādīni karaṇāni trayodaśa
GSP31kavsttvu:234_3: teṣāṃ janmamaraṇakaraṇānāṃ pratiniyamo vyavasthā sā tviyaṃ śarvaśarīreṣvekasminpuruṣe
GSP31kavsttvu:234_4: na sambhavati tathā satyekasminsukhini sarve sukhinaḥ syuḥ duḥkhini vā duḥkhino bhaveyuḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:234_5: tathā ekasmin mriyamāṇe sarve mriyeran jāyamāne ca jāyeran evamekasminnandhabadhirādau
GSP31kavsttvu:234_6: sarva eva tathā syuḥ na tvevamasti tathā ekasminvicitte sarve vicittāḥ syurityavyavasthā
GSP31kavsttvu:234_7: puruṣabhede tu samyagupapadyate vyavasthā / nacaikasminnapi puruṣe dehāntaropādhivaśāt
GSP31kavsttvu:234_8: upapadyata eva vyavastheti vācyam karacaraṇastanādibhedenāpi janmamaraṇādivyavasthā
GSP31kavsttvu:234_10: yathorddhvasrotasaḥ kecidrahobahulāḥ yathā manuṣyāḥ kecittamobahulāḥ yathā tiryagyonayaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:235: puruṣasya bahutvavadatriguṇatvaṃ vivekitvamaviṣayatvamasādhāraṇatvaṃ cetanatvamaprasavadharmitvaṃ sākṣitvādikamapi boddhavyam /
GSP31kavsttvu:236_0: pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṃyogakṛto 'yaṃ sargaḥ sa cāpekṣāṃ vinā bhinnayorna sambhavati
GSP31kavsttvu:236_1: apekṣā ca svadarśanārthaṃ puruṣeṇa pradhānasya pradhānaṃ hi viṣayātmakatayā bhogyam
GSP31kavsttvu:236_2: bhogaśca bhoktāramantareṇa na bhavatīti bhoktrapekṣā pradhānasya puruṣasya svakaivalyārthaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:236_3: pradhānāpekṣā pradhānena hi bhogyena sambhinnaḥ puruṣastadgataṃ duḥkhatrayaṃ svātmanyabhimanyamānaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:236_5: pradhānamantarā na bhavatīti puruṣasya pradhānāpekṣayā paṅgvandhavadubhayoḥ saṃyogaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:236_6: bhogāyānādiparamparāsaṃyukto 'pi kaivalyāya punaḥ saṃyujyate sa ca saṃyogo mahadādisargamantareṇa
GSP31kavsttvu:236_7: bhogāpavargayoḥ samartho na bhavatīti saṃyoga eva mahadādisargaṃ karoti / uktañca /
GSP31kavsttvu:239: ekādaśendriyāṇi pañca tanmātrāṇi ceti ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāmito gaṇaḥ ṣoḍaśakaḥ / uktañca tatra śabdatanmātrādākāśaṃ śabdaguṇam,
GSP31kavsttvu:244_0: adhyavasāyo buddhiḥ kriyākriyāvatorabhedavivakṣayā vyapadeśaḥ / dharmo jñānaṃ virāga
GSP31kavsttvu:244_1: aiśvaryamiti sāttvikāḥ buddhidharmāḥ etadviparītāstvadharmādayastāmasāḥ / buddhidharmādaiśvaryādaṇimādiprādurbhāvaḥ / tacca
GSP31kavsttvu:245: aṇimā mahimā caiva garimā laghimā tathā /
GSP31kavsttvu:247_0: nanvekādaśaka indriyagaṇaḥ pañcatanmātrakaṃ ceti dvividhaḥ pravartate sargo 'haṅkārāt
GSP31kavsttvu:247_1: tathā caikasmādahaṅkārāt kāraṇātkathaṃ prakāśajaḍātmako vilakṣaṇaḥ sarga iti yaduktaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:247_4: bhinnaṃ kāryaṃ karoti / nanu yadi sattvatamobhyāmeva sargaḥ kṛtaṃ tarhi rajasā akiñcikareṇeti
GSP31kavsttvu:247_5: cenna taijasādubhayamiti mūlakaraḥ taijasādubhayaṃ gaṇadvayaṃ bhavati sargadvayaṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:247_6: sattvatamasoriti / yadyapi rajaso na kāryāntaramasti tathāpi sattvatamasī svayamakriye
GSP31kavsttvu:247_7: samarthe api na kāryaṃ kuruto rajasā cālite tu tatprasādāt prāptakriye svakāryotpādane
GSP31kavsttvu:247_8: samarthe bhavata iti rājasādubhayam / yathāhuḥ ubhayasminnapi kārye sattvatamasoḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:247_9: kriyotpādanadvāreṇāsti rajasaḥ kāraṇatvamiti na vyarthaṃ raja
GSP31kavsttvu:292_0: ḥ saṅkalpo manaso vṛttirvyāpāraḥ / eteṣāṃ vṛttidvaividhyaṃ sādhāraṇatvāsādhāraṇatvābhyāmāha
GSP31kavsttvu:292_1: saiṣā bhavatyasāmānyā iti / eṣoktā 'sādhāraṇī vṛttiḥ sādhāraṇī vṛttistu karaṇānāṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:292_2: prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañca karaṇatrayasya pañca vāyavo vṛttirjīvanaṃ tadbhāve bhāvāt
GSP31kavsttvu:292_3: abhāve cābhāvāt / tatra prāṇo nāsāgrahṛnnābhipādāṅguṣṭhavṛttiḥ apānaḥ kṛkāṭikāpṛṣṭhapārśvapāyūpasthavṛttiḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:292_4: samāno hṛnnābhisarvasandhivṛttiḥ udāno hṛtkaṇṭhatālamūrdhabhrūmadhyavṛttiḥ vyānastvagvṛttiriti pañca vāyavaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:293: avidyā pañcavidhā tathāhi avidyā 'smitārāgadveṣābhiniveśā yathāsaṃkhyaṃ tamomohamahāmohatāmisrāndhatāmisrasaṃjñakā ceti pañcaparvā /
GSP31kavsttvu:294_1: uktañca eṣa pratyayasargo viparyayāśaktituṣṭisiddhyākhyaḥ / pratīyate 'neneti pratyayo
GSP31kavsttvu:294_2: buddhistasya sargaḥ pratyayasargaḥ / daivasargastu mūlakāreṇaiva spaṣṭo niruktaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:294_4: ityaṣṭavikalpo daivasargaḥ / tiryagyonayaśca pañcavidhā bhavanti paśumṛgapakṣisarīsṛpasthāvarāḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:295_0: nanu prādhāniko 'yaṃ sargaḥ pradhānaṃ ca jaḍaṃ kathaṃ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ vā pravṛttiṃ
GSP31kavsttvu:295_1: kartumarhati tasmātkenaciccetanena prakṛtyadhiṣṭhātrā bhavitavyam / na ca kṣetrajñāstathā
GSP31kavsttvu:295_2: teṣāṃ prakṛtisvarūpānabhijñatvāt tasmādasti prakṛteradhiṣṭhātā kaścitsarvajñaḥ sa
GSP31kavsttvu:295_3: eveśvara iti cenna acetanamapi prayojanavaśāt pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā vatsavivṛddhyarthamacetanamapi
GSP31kavsttvu:295_4: kṣīraṃ pravartate tathā jaḍāpi prakṛtiḥ puruṣavimokṣāya pravartiṣyate / kiñcābhokturīśvarasya
GSP31kavsttvu:295_5: pravṛttau na karuṇāṃ vinā 'nyat prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ / sā ca nirupādhiparaduḥkhaprahāṇecchā
GSP31kavsttvu:295_6: sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṃ prāṇyabhāvādeva tatsambandhiduḥkhābhāvāt kasya nivṛttau pravṛttiḥ syādīśvarasya /
GSP31kavsttvu:295_7: na ca sargānantaramīśvarapravṛttiḥ sargasya jātatvādeva neśvaraprayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:295_8: na ca duḥkhanivṛttiḥ prayojanaṃ tadarthaṃ tatpravṛttau jagati ko 'pi duḥkhī na syāt /
GSP31kavsttvu:295_9: uktañca prekṣāvataḥ pravṛtteḥ svārthakāruṇyābhyāṃ vyāptatvāt te ca jagatsargādvyāvartamāne
GSP31kavsttvu:295_10: prekṣāvatpravṛttipūrvakatvamapi nivartayataḥ na hyāptasakalepsitasya bhagavato jagatsṛjataḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:295_11: kimapyabhilaṣitaṃ bhavati nāpi kāruṇyādasya sarge pravṛttiḥ prāksargājjīvānāmindriyaśarīraviṣayānutpattau
GSP31kavsttvu:295_12: duḥkhābhāvena kasya prahāṇecchā kāruṇyena sṛṣṭiḥ sṛṣṭyā ca kāruṇyamiti parasparāśrayaḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:295_13: api ca karuṇayā pravṛttaḥ sukhina eva jantūnsṛjet na daridrān / na ca karmavaicitryāt
GSP31kavsttvu:295_14: jagadvaicitryam tarhi kṛtamīśvareṇa tata eva jagadvaicitryopapatteḥ pravṛttistu pārārthyaprayojanavaśāt
GSP31kavsttvu:296_0: nanu bhavatu prakṛteḥ pravartakaḥ puruṣārtho nivartakaṃ na tu kamapi paśyāma iti
GSP31kavsttvu:296_1: cenna yathā nartakī pariṣadbhyo nṛtyaṃ darśayitvā svayameva nivartate na tu tasyāḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:296_2: svanivṛttau nivartakāntarāpekṣā tathā śabdādyātmakaṃ svasvarūpaṃ puruṣādbhedena prakāśya
GSP31kavsttvu:296_3: sādhitapuruṣaprayojanā svayameva nivartate prakṛtiḥ / yathāhuḥ sāṃkhyācāryāḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:297: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate yathā nartakī nṛtyāt /
GSP31kavsttvu:299_0: nanu yathā darśitanṛtyā nartakī draṣṭṛkautuhalātpunaḥ pravartate tathā prakṛtirapi
GSP31kavsttvu:299_1: puruṣāyātmānaṃ darśayitvā nivṛttāpi punaścet pravartete tadā muktānāmapi punaḥ saṃsāraprāptiḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:299_2: syāditi cenna yathā parapuruṣadarśanāsahā sūryadarśanavarjitāpi kulavadhūḥ pramādādvigalitāṅgapaṭā
GSP31kavsttvu:299_3: cedavalokyate parapuruṣeṇa tadā 'sau tathā pravartate 'pramattāṃ yathaināṃ punaḥ
GSP31kavsttvu:299_4: puruṣāntarāni na paśyanti tathā prakṛtiḥ kulavadhūto 'pyadhikā dṛṣṭā biṃbakena punarna
GSP31kavsttvu:300: prakṛteḥ sukumārataraṃ na kiñcidastīti me matirbhavati /
GSP31kavsttvu:302: dharmo jñānaṃ virāga aiśvaryamiti sāttvikā buddhidharmāḥ /
GSP31kavsttvu:304: atra jñānavarjitaiḥ saptabhiḥ prakṛtirbadhnātyātmānaṃ vivekakhyātyā prakṛtipuruṣānyatājñānena saiva vimocayati / uktañca /
